Text: Sirus is tracking downloaders on these torrents.
Is this why I can't download these anymore?  These are usually my fastest downloads, and now when I add the torrents they never even start.  Tried several times.

Yep. Apparently the Howard 100 news team is doing a story on it. They claim they haven't taken over the site but I think that's what they're going to do then bust all the downloaders to send a message.
